content: Write me the “Conclusion” part of the article in 30 words. Include a call to action to the Target Audience and provide this information about myself: I am a solicitor and construction lawyer with more than 10 years experience specialising in construction law. I regularly advise homeowners and builders regarding their contractual and legal rights. I represent homeowners and builders in NSW, Australia as well as all courts of competent jurisdiction. I have advised homeowners, builders, and contractors regarding clause 27 in the HIA NSW Lump Sum Contract.. I have advised them on their contract rights, risks and obligations. I have negotiated and amended contracts to reflect their intentions.
